meanings.sent1: I heard the woofing of a dog in the distance.
meanings.sent2: The neighborhood was filled with the joyful woofing of playful puppies.
meanings.sent3: The woofing of the dog interrupted the quiet of the night.
meanings.sent4: The woofing of the dog echoed through the empty streets.
meanings.sent5: The woofing of the dog was music to my ears.

meanings.sent1: The dog was woofing loudly in the park.
meanings.sent2: She could hear the dog woofing from across the street.
meanings.sent3: The dog kept woofing noisily, demanding attention.
meanings.sent4: The dog's woofing echoed through the quiet night.
meanings.sent5: The woofing of the dog was so loud, it startled the birds nearby.

meanings.definition: A type of fabric used in weaving
meanings.sent1: The weaver carefully selected the woofing for the new tapestry.
meanings.sent2: The intricate design was created using the finest woofing available.
meanings.sent3: The woofing used in the weaving process added a unique texture to the fabric.
meanings.sent4: The colorful woofing brought life to the otherwise plain cloth.
meanings.sent5: The soft woofing felt smooth against the weaver's fingers.
